entry.title: Feud at Smithfield Foods Shows Messy Underside of Chinese Takeover
entry.content: The turmoil at WH Group marks an unexpected twist for a deal that raised political concerns amid a string of attempts by Chinese companies to buy up Western producers of resources needed to feed the countryâ€™s growing appetite.

entry.title: China's Plan to Manage Evergrande: Take It Apart, Slowly
entry.content: Beijing is working on a controlled implosion of the real-estate giant, selling off some of its assets while limiting damage to home buyers and businesses involved in its unfinished projects.
